item.title: How to Make a Customizable Google Custom Search Engine Box
item.description: Google Custom Search Engine (CSE) is a great service when you need to implement a search functionality to a website and do not spend too much time. However, the default way of implementing it restricting us to have a certain search box design that might not blend well to our website. In this post, I’ll show how I found a workaround solution and actually implement on this very blog. To see the solution in action, feel free to search anything on the search box at the top of the right sidebar.
